headline: Blue Yonder Fully Acquires Inmar Post-Purchase Solutions
summary: Doddle already owned 49 percent of Inmar Post-Purchase Solutions. Now, Blue Yonder owns 100 percent of the reverse logistics arm.

raw.headline: Blue Yonder Fully Acquires Inmar Post-Purchase Solutions
raw.summary: Doddle already owned 49 percent of Inmar Post-Purchase Solutions. Now, Blue Yonder owns 100 percent of the reverse logistics arm.

headline: Blue Yonder acquisition aims to streamline its returns process
summary: Scottsdale, Arizona-based supply chain management company Blue Yonder announced Wednesday that it has acquired full ownership of Inmar Post-Purchase Solutions and will continue to support FedEx Easy Returns. The post Blue Yonder acquisition aims to streamline its returns process appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: What Analyst Projections for Key Metrics Reveal About FedEx (FDX) Q4 Earnings
summary: Beyond analysts' top -and-bottom-line estimates for FedEx (FDX), evaluate projections for some of its key metrics to gain a better insight into how the business might have performed for the quarter ended May 2025.
